home.welcome: Hello. We are Global Elite Delivery.
home.definition: We package and deliver your order all around the world. We've driven a billion miles in our alternative fuel and advanced technology vehicles.
home.definition-bis: Find delivery dates, times, and published rates for sending your shipments to destinations around the world.
home.incoming: You have been forwarded from our partner OnWine in order to find a suitable packaging and shipping offer.
home.incomingCommand: Your command have been temporary saved.
home.steps: To pursue, follow the steps below:
home.step-one: Login or register, proceed to Account -> Sign in/Register
home.step-two: Choose your shipping details, proceed to Shipping
home.title: Commands

command.created: A new Command is created with identifier {{ param }}
command.updated: A Command is updated with identifier {{ param }}
command.deleted: A Command is deleted with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete Command {{ id }}?
